title: PGIMER Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for 02 Project Research Scientist I and Other Posts
description: The Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientist I and Project Technical Support I Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, 10th Pass, Diploma, and DMLT can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2026 . Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these pos...
